Monitoring Industries Using IOT || The project aims to monitor the factories and getting the information on your smartphone or other devices using IOT. Link

Smart Agriculture: Plant Watering and Field Monitoring System || Smart Agriculture is a project to make farming and gardening more smart and effective. Link
Smart Agriculture
I wanted to solve the three main problems which I discovered in some farms and parks : The plants are not properly and timely watered, or sometimes there is over watering. And lot of water is wasted. Many plants are affected by diseases which destroy the plants before they can be identified and treated.
https://oldblog.vimarsh.info/p/smart-agriculture.html
Smart Agriculture OG 2

Weather Station (Standard)
